divs: sighting detailsmy son was sleeping on the other side of our house & my sons fathers was sleeping next to me, when around midnight he & i awoke to a white orb basketball size hovering about 6-7 feet off the floor in our doorway with the door open, all the widows have blinds so no light could have leaked in. we could not really tell how long it was there but before we know it it was gone. the way the light seemed to glow from the inside the orb but not outside, it was like no light on this earth.the weirdest thing of all we had no fear no feelings like in a trance, we are very protechtive of our son but we didnt even see if he was ok after we just went back to sleep thats the scary part when u have no control... also now years later we seen a show where people had little peaces of metal with radio channels under there skin, and had them removed, mybe from a ufo. i think my son mite have sumthing close to that its in his right wrist, i need help finding out what it is. thank you, *(wit's name deleted -- cms\sg).
